description:
Hi there!!

My cozy studio apartment is located on the Upper West Side, a 5 min walk to Central Park West. In the heart of the city, you'll find amazing restaurants, shopping boutiques, salons, spas, & access to the MTA #123,BC trains which gets you to Times Square in 10 minutes!

In the art-deco building, you'll find a fitness center, pool table, 24 hour concierge, laundry room and access to the rooftop with lounge space.

Luxury Lifestyle

The gym location on the lower level of the common room
The rooftop

If needed, I can be reached via phone/text (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).

MTA #1,2,3,B,C trains
name: Large studio near trains & Central Park West!
review: I was disappointed with condition of place when I arrived.  It did not appear to have been cleaned before I arrived.  Floor and sink dirty, garbage filled to brim and not clear which, if any, were the clean linens.
